channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ UNDEROATH FORCED TO RESCHEDULE SOUTH AMERICAN TOUR DATES ☠⚡
item.description:
🎸🤘 RISE FROM THE ASHES, METALHEADS! 🤘🎸
Well, well, well—well, looks like the wizards of sound, Underoath, are facing the chaos of the tour life, and it's about to cut like a jagged shard of glass across our fiery hearts! That’s right, they’ve been yanked off stage for a rough reschedule of their epic South American dates!
**😱 NOT ANOTHER ONE! 😱** Damn it! Just when we thought we were gonna crank up the amps and unleash a symphony of metal madness upon the masses! But the metal gods are playing their twisted games, and it’s leaving us in the pit of despair!
This ain't just a temporary setback; it's a wicked reminder that even the fiercest warriors need to recalibrate! So, before you throw your horns up in despair, keep your eyes on the ultimate prize. 🔥
Keep that crypto wallet ready, fam! Unleash the power of the blockchain while you wait for Underoath to roar back. The virtual stage is always open, and while we wait, stack those coins and mosh like there’s no tomorrow!
⚡️ **Stay metal, stay crypted!** ⚡️
Check the full breakdown over at MetalSucks and keep rockin’ that digital revolution! \m/
🔗 [Read the chaos here!](https://www.metalsucks.net/2025/10/19/underoath-forced-to-reschedule-south-american-tour-dates/) 🔗
#MetalCulture #DeathMetal #MetalCommunity #ThrashMetal #HeavyMetal
